patterns: As an author, why is my name not clickable on the website?
As an author, why do I have neither a photo nor my twitter account on my tag result page on the Website?

Why does my author page not have good SEO
Where can I put my biography?
I can't find myself in Google by typing my name
In search engines like Google you can find me
My referencing on the site sucks
responses: As an author, you must create a TagMetadata type content attached to your name (Author Tag).
For SEO, by creating TagMetadata type content in the backoffice attached to your name (Author Tag), your name will become clickable.
To create a TagMetadata type content, you must have the ADMINISTRATOR role in the backoffice.
Your name is now clickable because you have created and attached a TagMetadata type content to your author tag.
You can now expand your TagMetadata page with your Twitter account, a biography and a photo.
Once saved, all of these will then appear on your author tag result page with the content attached to your name.
Historically, it is possible that two author tags exist.
You must therefore transfer all the content attached to a tag to the tag you want to keep using the tag merge tool.
Only administrators have access to this tag merge feature.
